price: 他们怎么舍他而择取别的保护者呢？安拉才是保护者，他能使死者复活，他对于万事是全能的。
arabic: أَمِ ٱتَّخَذُواْ مِن دُونِهِۦٓ أَوۡلِيَآءَۖ فَٱللَّهُ هُوَ ٱلۡوَلِيُّ وَهُوَ يُحۡيِ ٱلۡمَوۡتَىٰ وَهُوَ عَلَىٰ كُلِّ شَيۡءٖ قَدِيرٞ

version.title: Chinese Translation - Muhammad Makin
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Chinese by Muhammad Makin. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: ami ittakhadhū min dūnihi awliyāa fal-lahu huwa al-waliyu wahuwa yuḥ'yī al-mawtā wahuwa ʿalā kulli shayin qadīrun
